description: Spider API for web crawling and scraping.

inputs.name: spider_api_key
inputs.info: The Spider API Key, get it from https://spider.cloud

inputs.name: url
inputs.info: The URL to scrape or crawl

inputs.name: mode
inputs.info: The mode of operation: scrape or crawl

inputs.name: limit
inputs.info: The maximum amount of pages allowed to crawl per website. Set to 0 to crawl all pages.

inputs.name: depth
inputs.info: The crawl limit for maximum depth. If 0, no limit will be applied.

inputs.name: blacklist
inputs.info: Blacklist paths that you do not want to crawl. Use Regex patterns.

inputs.name: whitelist
inputs.info: Whitelist paths that you want to crawl, ignoring all other routes. Use Regex patterns.

inputs.name: readability
inputs.info: Use readability to pre-process the content for reading.

inputs.name: request_timeout
inputs.info: Timeout for the request in seconds.

inputs.name: params
inputs.info: Additional parameters to pass to the API. If provided, other inputs will be ignored.
